name: The Paradixion: Son's Room
description:
You wake up in a mysterious room that you've never seen before in your life. Explore the room, solve various puzzles, and uncover hidden stories to escape from this mysterious room.

The Paradixion: Son's Room is the first series of The Paradixion, a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere developed by a solo developer.

Enjoy the unique atmosphere of the game world, as well as the unique emotional story and various puzzles that can only be experienced in this world.

Anyone can play easily with simple controls that require no special skills or experience.
